tech_news.description: The noise-canceling WH-1000XM4 may be over five years old at this point, but they’re still a great buy at nearly $200 off.

tech_news.title: Pixel Studio adding image animations with GIF sharing, coming to Pixel 8 - 9to5Google
tech_news.description: Google looks to be bringing Pixel Studio to the Pixel 8 series with a new ability to animate images as GIFs.

tech_news.title: Google Nest Doorbell Cam (2025) Review: I’m So Tired of Subscriptions - Gizmodo

tech_news.title: Apple iOS 27 to Be No-Frills ‘Snow Leopard’ Update, Other Than New AI - Bloomberg.com
